url_patterns = [ 
    path('', views.HomeView.as_view(), name='home'), 
    path('password_options/', views.PasswordOptionsView.as_view(), name='password_options'), 
    path('generated_password/', views.GeneratedPasswordView.as_view(), name='generated_password'), 
    path('about/', views.AboutView.as_view(), name='about') 
]

from django.db import models 

class Password(models.Model): 
    length = models.IntegerField() 
    include_uppercase = models.BooleanField() 
    include_lowercase = models.BooleanField() 
    include_numbers = models.BooleanField() 
    include_symbols = models.BooleanField()

Welcome to the Password Generator

    path('', views.home, name='home'),
    path('calendar/', views.calendar, name='calendar'),
    path('event/<int:event_id>/', views.event_details, name='event_details'),
]

from django.db import models

class Event(models.Model):
    title = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    date = models.DateField()
    description = models.TextField()
    # Add any other required fields here
